utterances.speaker: doctor
utterances.text: How how may I help you?

utterances.speaker: patient
utterances.text: Hi uh nice to meet you. I've just uh been experiencing um a cough for the last few weeks and uh I also recently started noticing that I'm coughing up some blood as well, like it's mixed into like sputum.

utterances.speaker: doctor
utterances.text: I see, alright, so you said a few weeks for the cough. Is this more than three weeks, more than four weeks, or a few months?

utterances.speaker: patient
utterances.text: I would say it's almost I would say almost like three weeks now.

utterances.speaker: doctor
utterances.text: OK, when the cough started uh were you bringing up, um were you bringing up sputum or phlegm at that time?

utterances.speaker: patient
utterances.text: Uh yeah, initially it was just like um kind of white too, sometimes yellowish phlegm, but now over the last week I've been also noticing um some blood in it as well.

utterances.speaker: doctor
utterances.text: OK, and how much blood have you been bringing up? Um just trying to think in maybe uh teaspoon sizes if you can.

utterances.speaker: patient
utterances.text: Uh yeah, I would say maybe half a half a teaspoon.

utterances.speaker: doctor
utterances.text: OK. And, um have you been having any shortness of breath?

utterances.speaker: patient
utterances.text: um no, I don't think so. But kind of like I do feel some discomfort in my chest like I just associated it with the cough.

utterances.speaker: doctor
utterances.text: I see, have you had any uh any chest pain?

utterances.speaker: patient
utterances.text: Uh, no. It's more of just the discomfort with the coughing.

utterances.speaker: doctor
utterances.text: OK, and um have you had any changes to your breathing like like wheezing?

utterances.speaker: patient
utterances.text: Uh, no, nothing like that.

utterances.speaker: doctor
utterances.text: Alright. Um and have you had any infectious or viral type symptoms like itchy eyes, or runny runny nose, sore throat?

utterances.speaker: patient
utterances.text: Uh no, nothing like that.

utterances.speaker: doctor
utterances.text: OK, and um how has your energy been? Any any fatigue?

utterances.speaker: patient
utterances.text: Um it's kind of been a bit low over the last few weeks, just I feel more tired. Um yeah I had to miss a few days of work as well.

utterances.speaker: doctor
utterances.text: I see, alright. Um have you had any fevers or chills?

utterances.speaker: patient
utterances.text: Uh definitely I feel like I have had some chills over the last week. Um I haven't had a chance to measure my temperature though.

utterances.speaker: doctor
utterances.text: OK, have you felt feverish? Or have you felt hot at any point?

utterances.speaker: patient
utterances.text: Um, yeah I would say like a few times this week, I've also felt like hot.

utterances.speaker: doctor
utterances.text: Alright, have you had any um like night sweats?

utterances.speaker: patient
utterances.text: Uhm now that you mention it like I I would say two two days out of the last week I've had night sweats where my sheets were kind of just drenched when I, and then I woke up noticing that.

utterances.speaker: doctor
utterances.text: Alright. And how about your um your weight? Have you had any changes to your weight over the last several months?

utterances.speaker: patient
utterances.text: Yeah, I think I've lost maybe 10 pounds in the last couple months.

utterances.speaker: doctor
utterances.text: OK, that sounds like some, uh, some weight lost significant weight loss, have you been trying to lose weight?

utterances.speaker: patient
utterances.text: No, not really.

utterances.speaker: doctor
utterances.text: OK. Uhm and have you felt as though um like your heart's racing or beating really fast?

utterances.speaker: patient
utterances.text: No, nothing like that.

utterances.speaker: doctor
utterances.text: Have you had any uh like fainting or dizziness?

utterances.speaker: patient
utterances.text: No, nothing like that.

utterances.speaker: doctor
utterances.text: OK um and how about any nausea or vomiting?

utterances.speaker: patient
utterances.text: No, no, no nausea or vomiting.

utterances.speaker: doctor
utterances.text: Have you had any abdominal pain?

utterances.speaker: patient
utterances.text: No.

utterances.speaker: doctor
utterances.text: Any diarrhea?

utterances.speaker: patient
utterances.text: No.

utterances.speaker: doctor
utterances.text: Any urinary problems like pain or or going often?

utterances.speaker: patient
utterances.text: Uh no, nothing like that.

utterances.speaker: doctor
utterances.text: OK. Uh have you noticed any rashes anywhere?

utterances.speaker: patient
utterances.text: No, no rashes.

utterances.speaker: doctor
utterances.text: Have you had any muscle aches or joint pains?

utterances.speaker: patient
utterances.text: Um no, nothing like that.

utterances.speaker: doctor
utterances.text: OK, and um have you been diagnosed with any medical conditions in the past?

utterances.speaker: patient
utterances.text: No. Um I've been fairly healthy.

utterances.speaker: doctor
utterances.text: OK, that's good, and have you had any surgeries or any reasons to be hospitalized before?

utterances.speaker: patient
utterances.text: No.

utterances.speaker: doctor
utterances.text: Do you take any medications or any over the counter, supplements?

utterances.speaker: patient
utterances.text: Um no.

utterances.speaker: doctor
utterances.text: Alright, any allergies that you're aware of?

utterances.speaker: patient
utterances.text: Not that I know, no.

utterances.speaker: doctor
utterances.text: OK, and um are your immunizations up to date?

utterances.speaker: patient
utterances.text: Um immunizations are all up to date, yeah.

utterances.speaker: doctor
utterances.text: Alright, and currently um can you tell me a little bit about who you're living with and uh where you're living?

utterances.speaker: patient
utterances.text: Yeah, currently I'm living uh just in um it's kind of like a a home with just a, I don't really know the people too well, just kind of like a home where um a bunch of guys are just living and working separately. I just actually recently moved here from um The Philippines six months ago.

utterances.speaker: doctor
utterances.text: I see, OK. Um do you interact with many of the people in the house and and has anybody else been sick?

utterances.speaker: patient
utterances.text: Uhm I don't know if anyone else has been sick, I haven't really noticed that. I don't really see them too much.

utterances.speaker: doctor
utterances.text: OK, and six months ago prior to um yeah coming from the Philippines, was anybody sick there or did you hear of anybody that you spent time with having um tuberculosis?

utterances.speaker: patient
utterances.text: Um yeah, there's been, not anyone that I know of, but there's definitely like even where I worked and things like that, there's definitely people who have had tuberculosis in the past.

utterances.speaker: doctor
utterances.text: I see, OK. Um and, uh do you smoke cigarettes?

utterances.speaker: patient
utterances.text: No.

utterances.speaker: doctor
utterances.text: And uh how about smoking cannabis or using any products?

utterances.speaker: patient
utterances.text: No, nothing like that.

utterances.speaker: doctor
utterances.text: OK, and you use any recreational drugs?

utterances.speaker: patient
utterances.text: Uh, no.

utterances.speaker: doctor
utterances.text: OK, um and are you currently sexually active?

utterances.speaker: patient
utterances.text: Uh currently, no.

utterances.speaker: doctor
utterances.text: OK, um so no concerns for a sexually transmitted infection at this time?

utterances.speaker: patient
utterances.text: No.

utterances.speaker: doctor
utterances.text: OK, um and um have you traveled anywhere recently?

utterances.speaker: patient
utterances.text: Um not recently, no.

utterances.speaker: doctor
utterances.text: OK, but uh, and anybody in the family um have uh heart or lung conditions?

utterances.speaker: patient
utterances.text: No.

utterances.speaker: doctor
utterances.text: OK, um and any cancer that run in the family?

utterances.speaker: patient
utterances.text: Not that I know of.

utterances.speaker: doctor
utterances.text: OK, um so, uh I think that's everything I wanted to ask on on history today, so it sounds like you've been having this cough um that's been going on for just over three weeks now and starting with some um whitish clear sputum and more recently even started to be coughing up some blood as well. And you've also been really um fatigued and have had some malaise over the last several weeks. Um and any other symptoms or, oh and also yeah, you've had some night sweats, chills, and uh been feeling feverish as well, so we'll certainly check your temperature today too. OK, so anything I missed?

utterances.speaker: patient
utterances.text: Uh, no. I think that that sounds great. Thank you so much.

utterances.speaker: doctor
utterances.text: OK, so we'll get the um testing started for uh for the investigations. And yeah, if uh at any point symptoms get worse, we'll reevaluate.

utterances.speaker: control
utterances.text: Add differential diagnosis
